com.braintreegateway
Class TransactionGateway

java.lang.Object
  com.braintreegateway.TransactionGateway

public class TransactionGateway
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods to interact with Transactions. E.g. sales, credits, refunds, searches, etc. This class does not need to be instantiated directly. Instead, use BraintreeGateway.transaction() to get an instance of this class: 

 BraintreeGateway gateway = new BraintreeGateway(...);
 gateway.transaction().create(...)
For more detailed information on Transactions, see http://www.braintreepaymentsolutions.com/gateway/transaction-api

search

public ResourceCollection<Transaction> search(java.lang.String query)
Finds all Transactions that match the query and returns a ResourceCollection for paging through them starting at the first page. Analogous to "basic search" in the control panel.

Returns:
a ResourceCollection.

                                              int pageNumber)
Finds all Transactions that match the query and returns a ResourceCollection for paging through them starting with the given page. Analogous to "basic search" in the control panel. See: http://www.braintreepaymentsolutions.com/gateway/transaction-api

Returns:
a ResourceCollection.

submitForSettlement

public Result<Transaction> submitForSettlement(java.lang.String id,
                                               java.math.BigDecimal amount)
Submits the transaction with the given id to be settled for the given amount which must be less than or equal to the authorization amount.

Parameters:
id - of the transaction to submit for settlement.
amount - to settle. must be less than or equal to the authorization amount.
Returns:
Result.
